metadata.description: Accessibility specialist skills for Claude Code. WCAG 2.2 review, conformance auditing, and improvement planning tools.

plugins.name: a11y-specialist-skills
plugins.description: Accessibility skills: reviewing-a11y (WCAG reviews), auditing-wcag (conformance audits with automated scripts), planning-wcag-audit (audit planning), planning-a11y-improvement (maturity + roadmap).
